subject: Football
College Athletics
Colleges and Universities
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: The former Notre Dame coach Charlie Weis was hired at Kansas, where he will try to rebuild a program that won the Orange Bowl in 2008 but floundered under Turner Gill.
snippet: The former Notre Dame coach Charlie Weis was hired at Kansas, where he will try to rebuild a program that won the Orange Bowl in 2008 but floundered under Turner Gill.
